settings.content: Some cock rings have vibration, while others aren’t motorized and more simple. This guides discusses the reasons why you might a vibrating cock ring or a non-vibrating cock ring!

Cock rings have the primary function of increasing sensation in the penis by allowing blood to flow into the penis while it’s more difficult for blood to flow out of the penis. One result of this is that you can keep an erection longer, or have it feel harder due to the increased pressure. And with more surface area comes more sensitive nerve endings! Using a vibrating cock ring allows you to add an additional sensation into the mix, stimulating both you and also a partner. Using a vibrating one solo is fun because it combines sensations with the basic cock ring functions, and with a partner you can wear it in a fashion that lets their clit, perineum, vaginal or anal opening – really anything that’s touching the vibrating portion – be stimulated hands-free with vibration. Here are some things to consider while deciding between these two types of cock ring.

settings.heading: A Vibrating Cock Ring is also a Non-Vibrating Cock Ring
settings.text_content: Consider that when avibrating cock ringis turned off, it is anon-vibrating cock ring! You are more than welcome to use any motorized toy while powered off of course, so if vibration doesn’t float your boat one day, then you have the option to use it without. The only drawback is that vibrating cock rings are slightly bulkier to accommodate the motor, and also a little bit pricier.

settings.heading: What do you want to stimulate?
settings.text_content: Some cock rings are designed with the intention of stimulating the perineum (with or without vibration) while others have small motors that really just reach the immediate surroundings of your orifice. Others have longer, more extended surface areas to that parts like the clit or perineum can be stimulated.

settings.heading: What are you looking to spend?
settings.text_content: As a general rule, anything with a motor is going to cost a little more than something non-motorized. If you just want to get familiar with the sensation of a cock ring on it’s own and don’t want to spend much, a simple elastomer or silicone cock ring, or a cock ring with an adjustable size, will be a great first-time pick. Elastomer will be even more affordable than silicone – there are many different types of rubber cock rings, and silicone tends to be the most expensive material.

settings.content: "If vibration doesn’t float your boat one day, then you have the option to use it switched off!"

settings.heading: Types of Vibrating Cock Rings
settings.text_content: Cock rings com in all shapes and sizes! There arevibrating rabbit cock rings,vibrating cock sheaths that stay in place with a cock ring, ones that attach to butt plugs, ones designed to cradle the balls,app-compatible cock rings , silicone vibrating cock rings, and a whole lot more. It’s always a good idea to go with what your intuition tells you, but always read reviews for more information on specific styles!

settings.heading: The Versatility of Vibrating Cock Rings
settings.text_content: Powerful cock rings in particular can be used a variety of ways. Put one on a dildo, and it becomes a vibrating dildo! Or, stick your fingers through one and it can become a finger vibe. Sometimes people simply use cock rings as small, external vibrators with no insertable aspect at all!

settings.heading: What materials are you interested in?
settings.text_content: Specific materials will only exist in a non-vibrating format. For instance, a leather cock ring is preferred by many because it is less sticky than something made from a rubber polymer, but there are no motorized leather cock rings. Similarly, elastomer is a less pricey material that primarily exists in non-vibrating cock ring formats. There are always exceptions, but these materials are generally not made to last as long as silicone. However, silicone lubricant cannot be used on silicone or elastomer, but can be used with leather, so there are many things to consider when choosing a material.

settings.heading: Practical Considerations
settings.text_content: Consider how you want to use the cock ring in order to determine which one to buy. While vibrating cock rings are a lot of fun, you make not want the added bulk between you and your partner. If you want something that can be used in a bath or shower, make sure it’swaterproofif it vibrates. These are just a few bits of criteria you’ll want to consider in making your purchase.

settings.heading: Power Source
settings.text_content: Finally, if you’ve decided on a vibrating cock ring, consider whether you’d like a battery operated or rechargeable cock ring. Rechargeable cock rings tend to be more powerful, quieter, and easy to re-power, but you may prefer a battery operated one if you are traveling and want to make sure it won’t accidentally turn on. Battery operated vibrating cock rings are also more inexpensive!
